name: CreateMailchimpAccountExport
description:
Create a new account export in your Mailchimp account.

This tool initiates a new export of account data in your Mailchimp account. Use this when you need to generate and download account information from Mailchimp.

parameters.name: include_export_stages
parameters.description: Array of export stages to include in the account export.

value_schema.description: The stages of an account export to include.

parameters.name: export_starting_date
parameters.description: An ISO 8601 date to limit export to records created after this time. Excludes audiences.

value_schema.description: An ISO 8601 date that will limit the export to only records created after a given time. For instance, the reports stage will contain any campaign sent after the given timestamp. Audiences, however, are excluded from this limit.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: include_stages
parameters.description: The stages of an account export to include.

value_schema.description: The stages of an account export to include.

parameters.name: since_timestamp
parameters.description: An ISO 8601 date that will limit the export to only records created after a given time. For instance, the reports stage will contain any campaign sent after the given timestamp. Audiences, however, are excluded from this limit.

value_schema.description: An ISO 8601 date that will limit the export to only records created after a given time. For instance, the reports stage will contain any campaign sent after the given timestamp. Audiences, however, are excluded from this limit.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
